name: Water You Doing?
description:
Wield powerful water cannons! Spurt, splash, and spray as you play with the many interactive objects and physics-based toys in the world!

And remember:

If you ain't sprayin', you ain't playin'!

This game was made for the 2019 VR Austin Jam.

*********************

TECHNICAL

*********************

This game currently requires a Windows PC capable of running VR and a supported VR HMD and controllers.

Known supported platforms/hardware:

  • SteamVR:
    • HTC Vive with HTC Vive Wand Controllers
      • Knuckles/Index Controllers are not currently supported
    • Windows Mixed Reality with Windows Mixed Reality Controllers
      • Specifically tested using Samsung Odyssey+
